detail_desc: Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a padded collar and a zip with a chin guard and grosgrain zip tab with a text print. Front pockets with press-studs, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Base layer set with a top and pair of tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for optimal comfort. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Tights with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, pile-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and ribbed cuffs.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave. Detachable, padded hood with a soft pile lining, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap patch front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and press-studs at the sides of the hem. Pile lining.

Gently tailored, padded jacked in woven fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
V-neck gilet in soft faux fur with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Lined.

Padded jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket, zipped front pockets, and inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Nylon windbreaker with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Elasticated cuffs and a ribbed hem. Fleece lining.
Padded jacket with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Concealed zip down the front with a wind flap and visible buttons. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, patch front pockets at the bottom with a flap and button, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded parka with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and a small zipped pocket on one sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Jacket in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Jersey lining.
Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with quilted, padded sections on the shoulders and at the cuffs. Small stand-up collar, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.

Padded parka with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and a small zipped pocket on one sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Jacket with a soft pile lining, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets.

Softshell parka in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with soft fleece inside and a detachable hood with a soft fleece lining. Stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a zipped chest pocket. Elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a velvety finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a pile-lined stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Drawstring at the waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted lining.
Pile jacket with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and kangaroo pockets. Ribbed trims around the pockets and cuffs.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, a padded, detachable hood with a faux fur trim and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets with a press-stud, a sleeve pocket with a flap and press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, a drawstring at the waist, handwarmer pockets at the top and flap front pockets. Single back vent. Pile lining at the top, quilted lining below.

Block-patterned windbreaker in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and lined, detachable hood with a hook and loop strap. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt side pockets, elasticated cuffs and a ribbed hem. Lined.

Padded parka with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and a small zipped pocket on one sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets with a concealed press-stud, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets with a concealed press-stud, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jacket in soft fleece with a stand-up collar, fleece-lined hood and a yoke in woven fabric. Zip down the front with a chin guard and a zipped front pocket. Rounded and longer at the back.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, side pockets with press-studs and a detachable belt at the waist. Lined.
Short coat in soft pile with a rounded collar that can be folded up, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fluffy pile with long sleeves and no buttons. Jersey lining.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a sheen and a detachable lined hood with a narrow elasticated trim. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with a small fabric appliqué on the front, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a small appliqué at the top. Contrasting colour jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a padded collar and a zip with a chin guard and grosgrain zip tab with a text print. Front pockets with press-studs, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, a drawstring at the waist, handwarmer pockets at the top and flap front pockets. Single back vent. Pile lining at the top, quilted lining below.

Padded jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket, zipped front pockets, and inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Concealed zip down the front with a wind flap and visible buttons. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, patch front pockets at the bottom with a flap and button, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with a small fabric appliqué on the front, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.

Padded, gently fitted gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with a press-stud, and smocking at the sides. Lined.
Parka in a woven modal blend with a brushed finish. Detachable hood, diagonal zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.

Jacket in imitation leather with a detachable hood in a double layer of sweatshirt fabric. Small stand-up collar with a press-stud, a zip down the front, zipped front pockets, and quilted sections on the shoulders and sleeves. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a velvety finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a pile-lined stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Drawstring at the waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted lining.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a velvety finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a pile-lined stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Drawstring at the waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted lining.
Padded gilet with imitation leather details, a stand-up collar and detachable hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.

Block-patterned windbreaker in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and lined, detachable hood with a hook and loop strap. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt side pockets, elasticated cuffs and a ribbed hem. Lined.

Padded jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket, zipped front pockets, and inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Fleece-lined jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, a zipped chest pocket and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jacket in supersoft pile. Hood with appliqués, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and kangaroo pockets. Unlined.

Parka in washed cotton twill with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets and bellows front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist, elastication at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Padded parka in a cotton weave with a lined, detachable hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and a single back vent. Lined.

Parka in soft, washed cotton twill with embroidered text on the back and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and elastication at the hem. Pile lining.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with sturdy jersey on the undersides of the sleeves. Notch lapels in soft faux fur, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted details. Notch lapels with decorative press-studs, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.
Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Pile-lined biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections on the shoulders and at the back of the hem. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and zipped side pockets.
Padded gilet with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and diagonal pockets.

Padded satin bomber jacket with an embroidered motif front and back and a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Soft faux shearling jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped chest pocket. Rounded and longer at the back. Fleece lining.

Padded outdoor trousers in breathable windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with closed seams at critical points. Waist with elastication at the back and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the sides. Zip fly and press-studs, zipped front pockets and snow flaps at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Lightweight, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood and zip with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow elastication around the hood, at the cuffs and hem.
Padded gilet with a detachable, faux-fur trimmed hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a velvety finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip down the front with a chin guard, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets at the top, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted lining.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim and a ribbed stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Pile lining at the top and a quilted lining at the bottom.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, side pockets with press-studs and a detachable belt at the waist. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a velvety finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip down the front with a chin guard, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets at the top, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted lining.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with a soft fleece lining, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and padded, detachable hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, diagonal side pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining in recycled polyester.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and gathered seam down the back and sleeves. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Nylon bomber jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, front pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jacket in sequined mesh with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a velvety finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip down the front with a chin guard, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets at the top, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted lining.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, a flap back pocket with a press-stud, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Lightweight, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood and zip with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow elastication around the hood, at the cuffs and hem.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams at critical points. Zip fly and press-stud, side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, seams at the knees and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded parka in cotton canvas with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a decorative drawstring. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, chest and side pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Padded gilet with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and diagonal pockets.
Jacket with a soft pile lining, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Quilted sections at the sides and cuffs, and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Lightweight, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs.

Padded, gently fitted gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with a press-stud, and smocking at the sides. Lined.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The base layer is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
Jacket in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Jersey lining.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a velvety finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip down the front with a chin guard, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets at the top, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted lining.

Padded parka in a cotton weave with a lined, detachable hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and a single back vent. Lined.
Bomber jacket in mesh with reversible sequins, a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined in airy jersey.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, a flap back pocket with a press-stud, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, lined hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard, a zipped chest pocket and patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs and a snow flap with press-studs at the waist. Fleece lining. Reflective details.The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Fleece-lined jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, a zipped chest pocket and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Concealed zip down the front with a wind flap and visible buttons. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, patch front pockets at the bottom with a flap and button, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Parka in washed cotton twill with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets and bellows front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist, elastication at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently tailored jacket in a stretch dobby weave with narrow notch lapels, one button at the front, patch pockets and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge, small stand-up collar and zip down the front. Drawstring at the waist and elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Padded gilet with imitation leather details, a stand-up collar and detachable hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.

Windbreaker in nylon with a detachable hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and long raglan sleeves. Welt front pockets with a press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Lightweight nylon bomber jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

Longer down jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, small stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
Nylon windbreaker with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Fleece lining.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Puffer gilet in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and a rounded hem.
Glittery cardigan in soft pile with long sleeves and no fasteners. Jersey lining.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets at the front and elasticated cuffs. Lined.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, fleece-lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets, and an adjustable hook and loop fastening and fleece inner ribbing at the cuffs. Folded seams and reflective details. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Padded outdoor trousers in breathable windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with adjustable hook and loop tabs and elastication at the waist. Zipped front pockets, closed seams, a zip fly and press studs, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Thin bomber jacket in satin with embroidery on the back and on one sleeve, a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood with a decorative drawstring. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Chest pocket, two flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, welt side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Visible, gathered seams down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy cotton weave with a print and appliqués. Stand-up collar, detachable hood and zip at the front with a wind flap and press-studs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, ribbed inner cuffs and a single back vent. Quilted lining.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, padded hood, small, ribbed stand-up collar and two-way zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, a concealed drawstring at the hem and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a detachable, pile-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, a welt chest pocket, flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a detachable, pile-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, a welt chest pocket, flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Padded gilet in woven fabric with an imitation leather yoke. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets with a press-stud. Lined.

Bomber jacket in softly draping, patterned satin with a sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a ring pull, and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Welt side pockets and covered elastication at the hem. Lined.

Padded bomber jacket with a print motif on the back and embroidered appliqué on the front. Detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric, a small ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, zipped arm pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, a flap back pocket with a press-stud, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded parka in cotton canvas with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a decorative drawstring. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, chest and side pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood with a decorative drawstring. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Chest pocket, two flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Gently tailored, padded jacked in woven fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a velvety finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip down the front with a chin guard, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets at the top, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted lining.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a zip fly and press stud, diagonal pockets with hook and loop fastening at the front and one flap back pocket. Snow flaps at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams at critical points and reinforced sections at the calves and hems. Adjustable hook and loop tabs at the waist, a zip fly and press stud, diagonal front pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a flap back pocket. Snow flaps at the hems. Lined.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and gathered seam down the back and sleeves. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge and hook and loop tab at the back. Waterproof zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, a snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jacket in woven fabric with a small print motif at the top. Detachable, jersey-lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and gathered seam down the back and sleeves. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

prod_name: BB FUNC Air Ski Snow Pants
detail_desc: Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the sides, a zip fly and press-stud and zipped side pockets. Reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Puffer jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, covered elastication at the cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Concealed zip down the front with a wind flap and visible buttons. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, patch front pockets with a flap and button, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Puffer jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, covered elastication at the cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.
Quilted puffer gilet in woven fabric. Detachable hood with a faux fur trim, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets with a press-stud. Lined.

Padded jacket with a lined, detachable hood, stand-up collar and concealed zip with a wind flap and hook and loop fastening. Diagonal welt pockets with a concealed zip, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets at the top, fake front pockets with a decorative flap, a drawstring at the waist, and a single back vent. Faux shearling lining at the top and a quilted lining made from recycled polyester below. The padding is made from recycled polyester.
